Selected Commercial Projects

  • Renault R-Link Renault R-Link Project An Android Tablet for the automotive market - built with TomTom.

  • Harrods/Samsung Cross Device Streaming Service An Excellent example of what Websockets can do. Used Node.js and Android.

  • Panasonic IFE Panasonic Avionics In Flight Entertainment Demo Project for Panasonic - Done in partnerhsip with Migcan.

  • ShowTime: House of Lies iOS and Android Project - wih special build for Nook and Kindle Fire.

Open-Source Projects

  • Five-ng A fork of the Five project, personal streaming server and Android Client

  • Mobileorg+ A fork of the MobileOrg Iphone Project

  • VillageTelco Telephone Exchange in a Box
